snippet: The “ghost in America’s kitchen”: James Hemings, the brother of Sally Hemings, introduced fine French cuisine to America.
lead_paragraph: The “ghost in America’s kitchen”: James Hemings, the brother of Sally Hemings, introduced fine French cuisine to America.

headline.print_headline: James Hemings, Slave and Chef for Thomas Jefferson
